Class BufferUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gjt.sp.jedit.EBMessage
      • org.gjt.sp.jedit.msg.BufferUpdate

  • public class BufferUpdate
extends EBMessage
    Message sent when a buffer-related change occurs.
    Since:
    jEdit 2.2pre6
